name: dungeon_entrance
structure: Produces entries for different types of genres and worlds. The 'common' and 'rare' tables are generic and should be compatible with almost any world. To retain compatibility with most settings, the  non-generic tables should be called only from other tables by specifying their name directly.

tables.name: complication
entries: Locals consider the area sacred and try their best to prevent anyone from desecrating the place.
The entrance is located behind a hedge maze.
A partially collapsed wall has blocked the entrance and requires long hours of hard work to clear.
A barricade has been built around the entrance as if to prevent something from entering.
A barricade has been built around the entrance as if to prevent something from exiting.
A vicious beast has built its lair in the entrance.

tables.name: feature
entries: The entrance has been forced open, apparently quite recently.
Several large footprints can be seen around the entrance.
Claw marks and spatters of dried blood adorn the entrance.
A rotten animal carcass lies just inside the entrance.
A shield cut in half lies on the ground outside the entrance.
Inside the entrance there is uncovered pit trap, and the pierced remains of an earlier visitor can be seen in the bottom of the spike pit.
A tripwire has been set across the entrance [but there is no actual trap associated with it].
A hastily dug, shallow grave is visible next to the entrance.
The entrance is lined with skulls.
Rows of decapitated heads have been stuck on stakes outside the entrance.
Spider webs cover the entrance.
The ground near the entrance is littered with animal droppings.
A thick trail of slime leads into the entrance.
The entrance has been overgrown with plantlife.
A thick layer of soot covers the walls inside the entrance.
Clear signs of a recent fire mark the entrance.
A thin wisp of smoke emanates from the entrance.
Near the entrance there is an easy to spot, hastily dug cache. Buried there are some semiprecious stones in a leather pouch.
A weathered holy symbol has been fastened above the entrance.
